turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. How you doing? I'd like to place a pickup order from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what would you like to order from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am not going to have very much to that, I was hoping for two small pizzas you know with that thick crust I was hoping top get pepperoni, bacon, and sausage on that. Is that something you can do for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, did you want the same toppings on both pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it, the total for that will be $22.02. but before we order, let me confirm the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small pizzas with thick crust, both with pepperoni, bacon and sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pizza will be ready for pick up in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you very kindly for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm all set. Thank you very much.
